name: Jamie Oliver
description: Munira Islam is a Bangladeshi chef and culinary artist known for her innovative fusion of traditional Bangladeshi flavors and modern cooking techniques.

recipes.name: Beef Bhuna
recipes.method: Heat oil in a pan and fry the onions until golden brown. Add ginger and garlic and fry until fragrant. Add the beef and spices and cook until the beef is browned. Add tomatoes and cook until the tomatoes are soft and the beef is tender. Serve hot.

name: Gordon Ramsay
description: Tony Khan is a Bangladeshi chef and restaurateur known for his dedication to preserving and promoting traditional Bangladeshi cuisine.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Spices (cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala)
recipes.method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least an hour. Fry onions until golden brown. Add chicken and fry until browned. Boil rice and add the chicken mixture to it. Cook on low heat for about 20 minutes or until the rice is cooked. Serve hot.

name: Nigella Lawson
description: Tamim Rahman is a Bangladeshi chef and food writer known for his work in promoting healthy and sustainable eating habits.

recipes.name: Chingri Malai Curry
ingredients: Spices (cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala)
recipes.method: Fry onions until golden brown. Add ginger and garlic and fry until fragrant. Add spices and fry for a few more minutes. Add shrimp and cook until they turn pink. Add coconut milk and cook for a few more minutes. Serve hot with rice.

name: Bobby Flay
description: Shawkat Osman is a Bangladeshi chef and culinary educator known for his passion for teaching traditional Bangladeshi cooking methods to younger generations.

recipes.name: Fish Bhuna
recipes.method: Heat oil in a pan and fry the onions until golden brown. Add ginger and garlic and fry until fragrant. Add the fish and spices and cook until the fish is browned. Add tomatoes and cook until the tomatoes are soft and the fish is tender. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Beef Kala Bhuna
ingredients: Spices (cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala)
recipes.method: Fry onions until golden brown. Add garlic, ginger, and green chilies and fry until fragrant. Add beef and spices and cook until the beef is browned. Add a little water and cook until the beef is tender. Serve hot.

name: Alton Brown
description: Nusrat Jahan is a Bangladeshi chef and entrepreneur known for her innovative approach to fusion cuisine and her popular chain of gourmet food trucks.

recipes.name: Shorshe Ilish
recipes.method: Marinate the fish with turmeric and salt for 10 minutes. Heat mustard oil in a pan and fry the fish until browned. In the same oil, add mustard paste and green chilies and cook until fragrant. Add a little water and cook until the sauce thickens. Add the fish to the sauce and cook for a few more minutes. Serve hot with rice.
